title: Hexakill doesn't give Level 6 or 7 Tokens
body: Not sure if this is intentional or not, but considering we're getting points/mastery rankings for Hexakill, aren't we supposed to receive mastery tokens also? Had 2 Renekton games at S ranked and no tokens received? This a bug/oversight or intentional?

replies.body: did you even read the status?

As in any rotating queue game mode, we’ve specially tuned Champion Mastery so you can earn points in the mode. You’ll also be able to earn keys for your wins and loot chests for your (or your premade’s) S­-, S, and S+ games.

I read that, would have thought it applied to receiving tokens as well.

We're currently investigating an issue causing premade teams of 6 to not receive Champion Mastery points or tokens in Hexakill: TT. Η μετάφραση του κειμένου στα Ελληνικά δεν είναι διαθέσιμη. Θα ενημερώσουμε το κείμενο μόλις λάβουμε την μετάφραση. Ζητούμε συγγνώμη
thats also premade, i was solo qued....
Same thing with me, {{champion:22}}  lvl 5, got an S rank with her at Hexakill, no party and no token..
yeah i just didnt really bother playing it again that weekend, wasn't interested on the playstyle after that disappointment
